channel.title: Official proof of Kryptixs (Luke Leary's) death
channel.description:
Dartford motorcyclist dies in lamppost crash;
A motorcyclist from Dartford has died after his bike hit a kerb and a lamppost
Luke Leary, 24, was driving his motorbike on Sharnel Street in High Halstow on Wednesday 13 at 3.30pm.
The motorcycle hit the kerb and the rider collided with a lamppost. The bike came to a stop a short distance further along the road.
Mr Leary was pronounced dead at the scene.
Police are appealing for witnesses or anyone who saw the blue and white Suzuki motorcycle being ridden to contact the serious collision investigation unit on 01622 798538.
Proof: [url=http://www.gravesendreporter.co.uk/news/dartford_motorcyclist_dies_in_lamppost_crash_1_1411787]http://www.gravesendreporter.co.uk/news/dartford_motorcyclist_dies_in_lamppost_crash_1_1411787 [/url]

item.title: Official proof of Kryptixs (Luke Leary's) death
item.dc:creator: @SamanthaSoul SamanthaSoul
item.description:
@SamanthaSoul wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:12, topic:445230”][quote author=SamanthaSoul link=topic=547912.msg4020713#msg4020713 date=1339991728]
Pretty sure it’s spelled curb. Something is fishy here.

None of this adds up. The sudden death. The misspellings on the supposed “official” article.
I shall investigate further.
[/quote]
British spelling you dumbfuck

Now stop looking for ‘conspiracy theories’. No one really cares what you have to say about the matter, because you’re a heartless asshole[/quote]

Oh, I struck a nerve. My sincerest apologies, it was not my intent to make you cry. I know everyone’s really sensitive now because of Luke’s untimely passing.

holds you It’ll be ok. I’ll be your shoulder to cry on.

[quote=“Ruby, post:13, topic:445230”]SamanthaSoul, will you shut the fuck up.

This is not some huge fucking government conspiracy, this is not some massive plot by RSPS geniuses to kill a person over a server.

Will you take a step back and look at yourself you complete idiot.

Kryptix will be missed, sorely missed, but his death is nothing to do with us and certainly nothing to do with you. Leave it the hell alone.[/quote]

There’s something fishy here. You’re too blind to see it. None of this adds up. Where did he get the bike from? Some say it was from the money he scammed.

There are a lot of angry, bitter people in the world (you’re proof of that) and most of them are a bit crazy in the head. WHO KNOWS what they’re capable of? There’s something fishy going on here and I can’t believe how blind you are.

Read full topic

Alright, at least we know this is OFFICIALLY not bullshit (I knew it wasn’t in the first place), ANYWAY, rest in peace mate, and wish for the best, I’m sorry your life had to end at a young age, it’s very hard to imagine that you just stopped posting, but… I hope for the best in the after-life.

R.I.P.
